about_the_game:
Anomaly search in a western-style mansion where man-eating monsters lurk.


You have been trapped in a western-style mansion where man-eating monsters lurk. Discover the anomaly and let us escape from the western-style mansion.

If you discover the anomaly, turn off the lights and go downstairs.

If no anomaly is found, leave the lights on and go downstairs.

Game overview

This is a horror game themed around searching for anomalies.

The player is trapped in a western-style mansion where man-eating monsters lurk. The goal is to find anomalies and escape from the western-style mansion.

Players explore the hallways, and when they discover an anomaly, they must turn off the lights and head to the lower floor. If there is no anomaly, they proceed to the lower floor with the lights on.

The exploration begins on the 8th floor. If the player correctly identifies anomalies, they can advance to the next floor. However, if they fail, they are sent back to the 8th floor.

Some anomalies conceal terrifying monsters. Search for anomalies and escape safely!

Gameplay Duration

Approximately 10 to 30 minutes.

Pause Menu

During the game, press the ESC button to open the pause menu.

From the pause menu, you can select Settings or Exit Game.

Settings Options

Brightness：Adjust the brightness of the lights.

Camera Sensitivity：Adjust the speed of camera movement.

Controls

ESC：Open the pause menu

WASD：Move

Left Shift：Dash

Mouse：Move the camera

Left Click：Toggle the light switch


There are no particular restrictions on game distribution.

name: ８女
short_description: This is a horror game where you escape from a Western-style mansion where a monster that eats people lurks.
